content: P Universal diamond cup wheel (flat) Standard diamond cup wheel for angle grinders – for faster grinding of concrete, screed and natural stone ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond blades and cup wheels- - - ### FEATURES:Features Stable grinding speed – the higher concentration of abrasive diamonds help the cup wheel to run smoothly at a constant speed Upgraded lifetime – more abrasive diamonds per segment contributes to longer-lasting cup wheels Advanced cooling – patented cooling pins work to prevent damage to the cup wheel segments due to overheating Robust – these cup wheels are built from the highest-grade materials using durable contact welding Minimized vibration – every cup wheel is individually checked and balanced before leaving the plant Applications Grinding concrete, screed and natural stone ### TECHNICAL DATA: Tool type: Cordless angle grinder, Corded angle grinder Base material: Concrete, Screed, Natural stone Product Class: Standard Technical Data | Tool type | Cordless angle grinder, Corded angle grinder | Base material | Concrete, Screed, Natural stone | Product Class | Standard | Arbor size | 5/8 in ### ITEMS- 2238573 - Diamond cup wheel DG-CW 4 1/2 P univ - Package Size 1 pc - 2238574 - Diamond cup wheel DG-CW 5 P univ - Package Size 1 pc - 2238575 - Diamond cup wheel DG-CW 7 P univ - Package Size 1 pc
